title: "After Facebook, Silver Lake to invest Rs 5,655 crore in Reliance Jio Platforms"
excerpt: "After Facebook invested over Rs 43,000 crore in Jio platforms last month, Reliance Industries Limited (RIL) on Monday announced that US private equity firm Silver Lake will invest Rs 5,655 crore (nearly $750 million) into Jio platforms."
